name: City Holocaust
description:
A run and gun action game, set in the city of Garden City in Venezuela (an alternate version of my hometown "Maracay") The plot begin after a bad experiment with a I.A. from Biogen Robotics Research Laboratory, that progresively turns evil after was connected to network, releasing hordes of robots to invade the streets, causing caos and killing civilians, triggering a mechanical Holocaust. 

                                                     

We played as Tony Clide, a tormented former police officer, minutes before he was about to commit suicide, heard gunshots and the screams of people in the streets and saw thru his window those machines attacking civilians, now with nothing to lose, he is on his fight to end the hostile threat and prevent the enemy expansion, his high experience using a wide range of weapons and his broad sense of justice, it will help to defeat and destroy all machines and restore peace. 

                                       

The game features 15 levels, inspired by all those classics side- scrolling action games like Contra and Metal Slug, was my first project years ago, hope you enjoy!
